input.sentences: we are in location location today to take part in a 5k walk for charity .
before the walk begins | we walk around the city and see all the tourist locations .
we see this beautiful memorial with a fountain .
we finished the 5k in the afternoon and won a medal !
this is the finish line for the 5k .
output.sentences: We thought the park would be a good location for the charity walk.
We met a tourist, who talked about some other locations that might be good for our walk.
We paused to admire the beautiful memorial fountain.
The walk was finished in the afternoon, and the medal was received by my best friend.
I was relieved to have reached the finish line after the exhausting 5k walk, and eager to take a nap at home.
